attributes.action: Stop the illegal enclosure of common land for grazing projects
attributes.additional_details:
Common land is just that--COMMON. It's for the use of the commoners, enclosures of common land is theft from the people of this country, pure and simple.
all land illegally acquired by enclosure acts should be returned.

We want the government to stop the plans to fence and graze Yateley common and realise that it's the common people that own the land not the local councils.
